WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.LaunchChrome Url: $'''https://blogs.microsoft.com/''' WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Normal ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 BrowserInstance=> Browser
# Start of autogenerated actions using the recorder
@@source: 'Recorder'
WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.AttachToChromeByUrl TabUrl: 'https://blogs.microsoft.com/' AttachTimeout: 10 BrowserInstance=> Browser
@@source: 'Recorder'
WebAutomation.ExtractData.ExtractList BrowserInstance: Browser Control: $'''html > body > div > div:eq(1) > div > main > div > section:eq(0) > article''' ExtractionParameters: { ^['Css Selector', 'Attribute', 'Regex'], ['div > a > h3', 'Own Text', ''] } ExtractedData=> OutputData
# End of autogenerated actions using the recorder
Display.ShowMessageDialog.ShowMessage Title: $'''Titles''' Message: OutputData Icon: Display.Icon.None Buttons: Display.Buttons.OK DefaultButton: Display.DefaultButton.Button1 IsTopMost: False ButtonPressed=> ButtonPressed
WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
